tasks.label: Open Worktree Terminal (fzf)
tasks.command: cd "$(git worktree list | fzf --height 40% --reverse | awk '{print $1}')" && exec $SHELL

tasks.label: Create Worktree from Branch (fzf)
tasks.command: branch=$(/usr/bin/git branch -a | fzf --height 40% --reverse | sed 's/^[* ]*//' | sed 's/remotes\/origin\///') && repo=$(basename "$PWD") && clean_branch=$(echo "$branch" | tr '/' '-') && path="../${repo}-${clean_branch}" && /usr/bin/git worktree add "$path" "$branch" && /usr/bin/git worktree list

tasks.label: Remove Worktree (fzf)
tasks.command: path=$(/usr/bin/git worktree list | fzf --height 40% --reverse | awk '{print $1}') && echo "Removing: $path" && /usr/bin/git worktree remove "$path" && echo '\nRemoved successfully!' && /usr/bin/git worktree list
